imdb.title: Kangoku gakuen
imdb.plot: Hachimitsu Academy, once an all-girls school, has become co-ed, and teen Kiyoshi is one of five boys to enroll. When he is caught peeping, Kiyoshi is sent to the schools prison, where his punishment is carried out.

episodes.title: Mad Wax OVA
episodes.plot: Four of the five boys enjoy their new freedom and interactions with the girls, but Joe longs for the prison life again and plans a crime so extreme he is sure to be sent back.

episodes.title: The Peep Job
episodes.plot: Five boys newly enrolled in a formerly all-girls school, already having difficulty connecting with the girl students, run afoul of the school's "Underground Student Council" and face strict disciplinary measures.

episodes.title: The Man Who Viewed Too Much
episodes.plot: Hana is embarrassed when Kiyoshi sees her in a compromising position. Kiyoshi becomes desperate to keep his date with Chiyo, and searches for a way to get out of prison in time to meet her. Gakuto has plans of his own.

episodes.title: A Mighty Spurt
episodes.plot: With Meiko's attention divided between two groups, Kiyoshi is able to widen the escape hole enough to let him through in time for his date. An already-suspicious Shingo gets an eyeful of more than he bargained for.

episodes.title: Take Me Out to the Sumoland
episodes.plot: After committing a heinous offense against Mari, Gakuto receives a drastic punishment from Meiko. Kiyoshi and Gakuto work desperately to break Kiyoshi out of the prison by having him impersonate a girl.

episodes.title: The School Is Number One Most Treacherous Man
episodes.plot: After Kiyoshi's escape for his date with Chiyo gets discovered he almost gets expelled, but Chiyo comes to his rescue. After returning to the cell the other boys shun Kiyoshi for the extra prison time they were given for the escape.

episodes.title: Vengeance Is Hana's
episodes.plot: Mari introduces the DTO plan to Hana, and they begin plotting ways to drive the boys out of school. Shingo leads the others boys in shunning Kiyoshi, but Meiko has plans to drive an even deeper wedge between them.

episodes.title: Meiko's Delicious Restaurant
episodes.plot: Shingo, on furlough from the prison, meets a girl named Anzu at the arcade in town. When Gakuto turns to his Guan Yu figurine for guidance, the tip of his sword falls off, starting a chain of events with momentous consequences.

episodes.title: The Diary of Andre
episodes.plot: Andre suffers a mental collapse when he goes for a week without receiving any discipline. Shingo takes Anzu to the movies, but finds his expectations betrayed. The Underground Student Council moves forward with their DTO project.

episodes.title: Full of Bodily Fluids
episodes.plot: Shingo realizes that he saw emails regarding DTO on the computer in the corrections office, which if recovered by the boys, would prove that they were set up. The boys plot to break into the corrections office.

episodes.title: It's a Bum-derful Life
episodes.plot: The boys are resigned to their upcoming expulsions, and spirits are low, until Gakuto, suffering a bout of temporary insanity, devises one last strategy to get them out of their predicament, if they can just buy enough time to pull it off.

episodes.title: Eryngii Brockovich
episodes.plot: Given a one-day reprieve, the boys must again execute a plan to get inside the corrections office, but the Underground Student Council won't make it easy for them. Hana has a personal score that she wishes to settle with Kiyoshi.

episodes.title: Good Morning, Prison!
episodes.plot: Hana continues pressing Kiyoshi in order to exact her revenge, but Kiyoshi employs an adaptation of a classical military strategy to counter her. Once all the boys are locked into their cells for the night, will they be able to complete their plan?
